body:
We can quickly identify the offending maps with a hacky lint check and then sneak fixes into the next playtest.  This might also affect RA.

We should also disable the owner row for all map props in TD.

TD:

```
Testing map: Lessons from Kosovo
OpenRA.Utility(1,1): Error: Actor t02 is owned by Creeps instead of Neutral.
OpenRA.Utility(1,1): Error: Actor split2 is owned by Creeps instead of Neutral.
```

RA (probably intentional, but why should we want these to be automatically targeted?):

```
Testing map: Tournament Island
```

> RA (probably intentional, but why should we want these to be automatically targeted?):

Barrels are not auto-targeted (I tested it), and we don't want them to require force-firing, so I'd say that map is fine as-is.
Ah, ok.  Looks like we only need to fix those two TD maps then.
Yep, it was intentional to put the barrels on the Creeps faction on Tournament Island
